items.title: Libya expels aid groups accused of 'African' population plot
items.description: The groups, including the UN refugee agency, are accused of trying to change Libya's "demographic composition".

items.title: South Korea's president has been removed from power: What happens now?
items.description: The constitutional court unanimously upheld the impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol.

items.title: Bollywood actor and director Manoj Kumar dies at 87
items.description: Manoj Kumar was best known for his patriotic films in the 1960s and 1970s.

items.title: Celebrations and sorrow as South Korea president removed from office
items.description: South Korea's constitutional court has unanimously voted to uphold the impeachment of president Yoon Suk Yeol.

items.title: TV's Dr Oz confirmed to lead Medicare and Medicaid
items.description: Oz, who has never held public office, is best known for hosting US daytime TV show The Dr Oz Show.
